Database/include/sqlite3ext.h

00001 /*
00002  ** 2006 June 7
00003  **
00004  ** The author disclaims copyright to this source code.  In place of
00005  ** a legal notice, here is a blessing:
00006  **
00007  **    May you do good and not evil.
00008  **    May you find forgiveness for yourself and forgive others.
00009  **    May you share freely, never taking more than you give.
00010  **
00011  *************************************************************************
00012  ** This header file defines the SQLite interface for use by
00013  ** shared libraries that want to be imported as extensions into
00014  ** an SQLite instance.  Shared libraries that intend to be loaded
00015  ** as extensions by SQLite should #include this file instead of
00016  ** sqlite3.h.
00017  **
00018  ** @(#) $Id: sqlite3ext.h,v 1.25 2008/10/12 00:27:54 shane Exp $
00019  */
00020 #ifndef _SQLITE3EXT_H_
00021 #define _SQLITE3EXT_H_
00022 #include "sqlite3.h"
00023 
00024 
00025 
00026 typedef struct sqlite3_api_routines sqlite3_api_routines;
00027 
00028 /*
00029  ** The following structure holds pointers to all of the SQLite API
00030  ** routines.
00031  **
00032  ** WARNING:  In order to maintain backwards compatibility, add new
00033  ** interfaces to the end of this structure only.  If you insert new
00034  ** interfaces in the middle of this structure, then older different
00035  ** versions of SQLite will not be able to load each others' shared
00036  ** libraries!
00037  */
00038 struct sqlite3_api_routines {
00039         void * (*aggregate_context)(sqlite3_context*,int nBytes);
00040         int  (*aggregate_count)(sqlite3_context*);
00041         int  (*bind_blob)(sqlite3_stmt*,int,const void*,int n,void(*)(void*));
00042         int  (*bind_double)(sqlite3_stmt*,int,double);
00043         int  (*bind_int)(sqlite3_stmt*,int,int);
00044         int  (*bind_int64)(sqlite3_stmt*,int,sqlite_int64);
00045         int  (*bind_null)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00046         int  (*bind_parameter_count)(sqlite3_stmt*);
00047         int  (*bind_parameter_index)(sqlite3_stmt*,const char*zName);
00048         const char * (*bind_parameter_name)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00049         int  (*bind_text)(sqlite3_stmt*,int,const char*,int n,void(*)(void*));
00050         int  (*bind_text16)(sqlite3_stmt*,int,const void*,int,void(*)(void*));
00051         int  (*bind_value)(sqlite3_stmt*,int,const sqlite3_value*);
00052         int  (*busy_handler)(sqlite3*,int(*)(void*,int),void*);
00053         int  (*busy_timeout)(sqlite3*,int ms);
00054         int  (*changes)(sqlite3*);
00055         int  (*close)(sqlite3*);
00056         int  (*collation_needed)(sqlite3*,void*,void(*)(void*,sqlite3*,int eTextRep,const char*));
00057         int  (*collation_needed16)(sqlite3*,void*,void(*)(void*,sqlite3*,int eTextRep,const void*));
00058         const void * (*column_blob)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00059         int  (*column_bytes)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00060         int  (*column_bytes16)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00061         int  (*column_count)(sqlite3_stmt*pStmt);
00062         const char * (*column_database_name)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00063         const void * (*column_database_name16)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00064         const char * (*column_decltype)(sqlite3_stmt*,int i);
00065         const void * (*column_decltype16)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00066         double  (*column_double)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00067         int  (*column_int)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00068         sqlite_int64  (*column_int64)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00069         const char * (*column_name)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00070         const void * (*column_name16)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00071         const char * (*column_origin_name)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00072         const void * (*column_origin_name16)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00073         const char * (*column_table_name)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00074         const void * (*column_table_name16)(sqlite3_stmt*,int);
00075         const unsigned char * (*column_text)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00076         const void * (*column_text16)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00077         int  (*column_type)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00078         sqlite3_value* (*column_value)(sqlite3_stmt*,int iCol);
00079         void * (*commit_hook)(sqlite3*,int(*)(void*),void*);
00080         int  (*complete)(const char*sql);
00081         int  (*complete16)(const void*sql);
00082         int  (*create_collation)(sqlite3*,const char*,int,void*,int(*)(void*,int,const void*,int,const void*));
00083         int  (*create_collation16)(sqlite3*,const void*,int,void*,int(*)(void*,int,const void*,int,const void*));
00084         int  (*create_function)(sqlite3*,const char*,int,int,void*,void (*xFunc)(sqlite3_context*,int,sqlite3_value**),void (*xStep)(sqlite3_context*,int,sqlite3_value**),void (*xFinal)(sqlite3_context*));
00085         int  (*create_function16)(sqlite3*,const void*,int,int,void*,void (*xFunc)(sqlite3_context*,int,sqlite3_value**),void (*xStep)(sqlite3_context*,int,sqlite3_value**),void (*xFinal)(sqlite3_context*));
00086         int (*create_module)(sqlite3*,const char*,const sqlite3_module*,void*);
00087         int  (*data_count)(sqlite3_stmt*pStmt);
00088         sqlite3 * (*db_handle)(sqlite3_stmt*);
00089         int (*declare_vtab)(sqlite3*,const char*);
00090         int  (*enable_shared_cache)(int);
00091         int  (*errcode)(sqlite3*db);
00092         const char * (*errmsg)(sqlite3*);
00093         const void * (*errmsg16)(sqlite3*);
00094         int  (*exec)(sqlite3*,const char*,sqlite3_callback,void*,char**);
00095         int  (*expired)(sqlite3_stmt*);
00096         int  (*finalize)(sqlite3_stmt*pStmt);
00097         void  (*free)(void*);
00098         void  (*free_table)(char**result);
00099         int  (*get_autocommit)(sqlite3*);
00100         void * (*get_auxdata)(sqlite3_context*,int);
00101         int  (*get_table)(sqlite3*,const char*,char***,int*,int*,char**);
00102         int  (*global_recover)(void);
00103         void  (*interruptx)(sqlite3*);
00104         sqlite_int64  (*last_insert_rowid)(sqlite3*);
00105         const char * (*libversion)(void);
00106         int  (*libversion_number)(void);
00107         void *(*malloc)(int);
00108         char * (*mprintf)(const char*,...);
00109         int  (*open)(const char*,sqlite3**);
00110         int  (*open16)(const void*,sqlite3**);
00111         int  (*prepare)(sqlite3*,const char*,int,sqlite3_stmt**,const char**);
00112         int  (*prepare16)(sqlite3*,const void*,int,sqlite3_stmt**,const void**);
00113         void * (*profile)(sqlite3*,void(*)(void*,const char*,sqlite_uint64),void*);
00114         void  (*progress_handler)(sqlite3*,int,int(*)(void*),void*);
00115         void *(*realloc)(void*,int);
00116         int  (*reset)(sqlite3_stmt*pStmt);
00117         void  (*result_blob)(sqlite3_context*,const void*,int,void(*)(void*));
00118         void  (*result_double)(sqlite3_context*,double);
00119         void  (*result_error)(sqlite3_context*,const char*,int);
00120         void  (*result_error16)(sqlite3_context*,const void*,int);
00121         void  (*result_int)(sqlite3_context*,int);
00122         void  (*result_int64)(sqlite3_context*,sqlite_int64);
00123         void  (*result_null)(sqlite3_context*);
00124         void  (*result_text)(sqlite3_context*,const char*,int,void(*)(void*));

00127         void  (*result_text16le)(sqlite3_context*,const void*,int,void(*)(void*));
00128         void  (*result_value)(sqlite3_context*,sqlite3_value*);

00133         int  (*step)(sqlite3_stmt*);

00136         int  (*total_changes)(sqlite3*);

00139         void * (*update_hook)(sqlite3*,void(*)(void*,int ,char const*,char const*,sqlite_int64),void*);
00140         void * (*user_data)(sqlite3_context*);
00141         const void * (*value_blob)(sqlite3_value*);
00142         int  (*value_bytes)(sqlite3_value*);
00143         int  (*value_bytes16)(sqlite3_value*);
00144         double  (*value_double)(sqlite3_value*);
00145         int  (*value_int)(sqlite3_value*);

00200 /*
00201  ** The following macros redefine the API routines so that they are
00202  ** redirected throught the global sqlite3_api structure.
00203  **
00204  ** This header file is also used by the loadext.c source file
00205  ** (part of the main SQLite library - not an extension) so that
00206  ** it can get access to the sqlite3_api_routines structure
00207  ** definition.  But the main library does not want to redefine
00208  ** the API.  So the redefinition macros are only valid if the
00209  ** SQLITE_CORE macros is undefined.
00210  */
00211 #ifndef SQLITE_CORE
00212 #define sqlite3_aggregate_context      sqlite3_api->aggregate_context
00213 #ifndef SQLITE_OMIT_DEPRECATED
00214 #define sqlite3_aggregate_count        sqlite3_api->aggregate_count
00215 #endif
00216 #define sqlite3_bind_blob              sqlite3_api->bind_blob
00217 #define sqlite3_bind_double            sqlite3_api->bind_double
00218 #define sqlite3_bind_int               sqlite3_api->bind_int
00219 #define sqlite3_bind_int64             sqlite3_api->bind_int64
00220 #define sqlite3_bind_null              sqlite3_api->bind_null
00221 #define sqlite3_bind_parameter_count   sqlite3_api->bind_parameter_count
00222 #define sqlite3_bind_parameter_index   sqlite3_api->bind_parameter_index
00223 #define sqlite3_bind_parameter_name    sqlite3_api->bind_parameter_name
00224 #define sqlite3_bind_text              sqlite3_api->bind_text
00225 #define sqlite3_bind_text16            sqlite3_api->bind_text16
00226 #define sqlite3_bind_value             sqlite3_api->bind_value
00227 #define sqlite3_busy_handler           sqlite3_api->busy_handler
